records.summary: Scottsdale
records.story: My husband and I were driving back from dinner (we were traveling east on Westland in North Scottsdale, AZ) and as we were driving we saw a bluish circular craft flying in the sky in front of us.  We at first thought it was a shooting star as it was traveling quicker than a plane would.   We both realized, simultaneously, that is was not a plane.  It kept traveling at a fast rate and the blue light seemed to have some green to the tint of its light.  It made an arched turn near and above Desert Mountain and than disappeared from sight.

records.summary: Objects in the skies of Scottsdale.
records.story: Objects in the skies of Scottsdale. It was about 5:30 AM there seemed to be an object with three lights in a form of a triangle. The lights changed color into Blue and White.   The other object looked like a sphere and was spinning but stayed in place the color of the sphere was Blue.  Another was just lights, about 2 they were White and Blue & another flashing red light appeared to the side.   The other sighting was a straight line with lights on the end Red and White, this appearence did make a sound.  Last sighting was just a white sphere. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: A bright red object was seen traveling from west Phoenix to east TempeSpeed was slow (probably too slow for most aircraft), it also app
records.story: Summary : A bright red object was seen traveling from west Phoenix to east Tempe  Speed was slow (probably too slow for most aircraft), it also appeared to climb gradually until it reached the east side of Tempe (from approx 8000' to approx. 12000') at this point it appeared to stop and slowly turn white and climbed to a vanishing point. Object was viewed from a roof top close to Camelback and Scottsdale Rd.  My son ((name deleted)) and I were on the roof viewing the various firework shows going on around the area.    At 2113 my wife had gone into the house andwithin a couple of minutes the bright red object grabbed my attention because it wasn't strobing like regular red lights on the other aircraftin the area (viewed through the binoculars no other lights or any form wasvisible).   We then watched it as it traveled from west to east very slowly for probably 15 minutes before it slowed to what appeared to bea complete stop.   It then slowly turned to more of a whitish color andslowly ascended out of sight.

records.summary: Seven Orange "Fireball" Objects Dance in the Arizona Moonlight
records.story: Seven Orange "Fireball" Objects Dance in the Arizona Moonlight While walking down deserted road on Indian reservation at 2:30 am, was looking at the moon and noticed 7 or so orange "fireball" type objects.  They appeared kind of slowly, like when you light a candle and the flame is faint at first then becomes stronger.  While observing this (with much excitement), noticed that two of the orange balls began to move.  They started doing sort of a figure eight around each other, clearly an impossibility for today's aircraft.  They did this for several seconds ( i would say the whole incident was about 10-15 seconds) and then all 7 objects vanished. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Strange, but peacefull object  fly follow my car ..
records.story: Strange, but peacefull object  fly follow my car .. I saw big ball white or silver.. Stay at the same place for almost an hour. After 30 min. Over this ball flash 4 extremely bright small balls of light.. After 10 min, small balls vanish.. I went into my car and start driving my car.. Big object was flying with me over 40 miles into my appartment. For all way home this object was visible across my sunroof.. I stop my car front of my gate. Object syart changing shape and turn into 3 small objects. One was shoot into the grand. All this happen between d:30 pm and 6:30 pm.. This object for sure was fallow me..

records.summary: 3 bright red lights in formation over Scottsdale Arizona March 24 2012 at 9:30 PM.
records.story: 3 bright red lights in formation over Scottsdale Arizona March 24 2012 at 9:30 PM. We had finished working in downtown Scottsdale, Arizona and were loading up our equipment into our vehicle before we noticed the event that took place in the sky above.  It was around 9:30PM.  We got in our vehicle and noticed 3 bright red lights in the clear sky, moving slowly toward us from far away in the West.  Friends were outside our vehicle in the parking lot and we mentioned the lights to them.  One of our friends took a picture with her cell phone.  The lights were equal-distant apart from each other as if in formation.  They were steady and not flashing during the whole sighting.  They then turned to the South and looped back in a Southwesterly direction and upward until they disappeared.  They stayed in formation the entire time.

records.summary: 2nd Sighting, Orange UFO East of Scottsdale Arizona 10/19/2012
records.story: 2nd Sighting, Orange UFO East of Scottsdale Arizona 10/19/2012 As before, the UFO glowed a bright orange and entered the Phoenix area from the East over the Superstition Mountains and stopped over the Native American reservation which is East of Scottsdale Arizona.  This second time, the UFO was a little North of where it appeared the first time tonight.  As before, the UFO stopped in mid-air for some time and moved around slightly before performing an impossible 180 degree turn and quickly returning East from where it came. I was able to call nearby family this time, whereas last time they didn't pick up the phone in time. They were able to see the UFO before it left this time, so I increased the number of witnesses to three. If you can gain access to any weather, visibility, "sunrise", or traffic cameras that point toward the Superstition Mountains and look out across the reservation - you will find footage. It glowed brighter than any stars, and brighter than any aircraft. Specific times were 11:05pm and 11:25pm. Additionally, the last plane to leave Sky Harbor International Airport in this direction was at 11:05pm.  The pilot, seemingly upon seeing the craft, executed a tight turn South. I did not see another plane or helicopter in the air until about 11:45pm.  Not even police, and not a single aircraft flew in from the area of the UFO - which was in a flight-lane used as an approach for Sky Harbor.

records.summary: 13 orange lighted craft in line formation moving to the North in Northwest Scottsdale Az
records.story: 13 orange lighted craft in line formation moving to the North in Northwest Scottsdale Az Between 2225 and 2235 in North Scottsdale Arizona (Shea blvd & 92nd street) I observed 13 slow moving craft heading from the south East over what looks to be the south Fountain Hills area to the North.  I heard no sound and these crafts were not like the other planes I observed in the sky.  At first I saw 3 and took a video and some pictures on my iPhone however they are very dark.  I could see a whole line of the coming up over the horizon tree tops about a quarter of a mile out from my position in a second story balcony.  I had no other witnesses with me at this time.  I lost site of the craft as they moved into light cloud cover and direction changed from heading directly toward me (from the south east to the north west) and began moving North.  The lights became very faint until I could not see them any longer.  I counted 13 to 15 of these objects.

records.summary: Red and White light seen flying low and fast from East to West disapears instantly in Phoenix area.
records.story: Red and White light seen flying low and fast from East to West disapears instantly in Phoenix area. Looking North from South Scottsdale just South East of Camelback Mountain and saw a red and white light going from east to west and going very fast then disappeared.  It was very low and went in front of the mountain.  There was no tail and it disappeared instantly after about 3 seconds.

records.summary: Brilliant undulating light hung motionless in the horizon, eventually dimmed, came back, and then disappeared
records.story: Brilliant undulating light hung motionless in the horizon, eventually dimmed, came back, and then disappeared I stepped outside on my front porch and noticed a brilliant white sphere shaped light near the Northwest Horizon, just to the right and above the setting moon.  It appeared to undulate slightly but was not blinking. It was brighter than any planet I had ever seen.  I heard no noise.  Thinking it was an airplane, I watched for it to move, but over a 10 minute period it remained largely stationary.  I went to get my wife to show her. When I came back out with my wife, it had dimmed slightly but was still very bright.  We watched it for another 5 minutes.  I then went to get my binoculars to get a better look.  Just as I went into the house, my wife yelled for me to return because it had dimmed.  I came back to see the light fade out and go completely dark for a few seconds.  Then it returned briefly for a few seconds and then disappeared completely.  After it disappeared, we noticed a much dimmer light in the general vicinity that also faded to nothing after a few seconds.  About 10 minutes afterwards, a helicopter flew over the house very fast and low, but it was headed from east to west rather than northwest.

records.summary: I have seen this odd light formation on several occasions (times seen;  about, 6 times over 15 years)the first time was back in 1990 tr
records.story: I have seen this odd light formation on several occasions (times seen;  about, 6 times over 15 years) the first time was back in 1990 traveling over the Salt River Indian wash coming from Mesa, my daughter keeps telling me about the lights she see's out the back window of our car, I look and was shocked at what I saw; there were 5 lights all white and all rotating independently, all 5 lights were in one giant circle, as they swirled independently and at the same time came in towards the center once and then came back out to make a circle and during this time the whole circle is moving clockwise in step with the timing of the in and out movement, there is no sound. Several Months pass and I see the lights again, this time just above my house, then I see them again, several more times over the years and now again in March, always over my house except that first time.  I realized that the only time I ever see this is when there is a thick cloud cover, after noticing this the last time in March of 2013, I went into the house for only about 10 minutes (it was still going on) when I came out the sky had cleared up except for one cloud and in that cloud was a small version of what I saw still moving around, when I saw that, I figured to myself; it's time to write to the National UFO hotline and see if I'm all alone on this thing or have others seen it?  No one I ask has ever seen anything like that or they give me a funny look.  I can say with all honesty, this is real but have no clue to what it is or wants. It was one large circular craft with five giant lights all circling independently and then coming into the center and then back out again! , all the time moving  clockwise. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the sighting is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: I saw a cluster of white lights from 11:30pm-1:00am slowly moving across the sky.
records.story: I saw a cluster of white lights from 11:30pm-1:00am slowly moving across the sky. At around 11:30pm on September 11, 2013, I saw an unfamiliar cluster of white lights in the sky.  They looked like stars, so I just assumed I hadn't noticed them before.  But around midnight I noticed that the cluster seemed to have moved slightly from where it was earlier.  I paid close attention to it from midnight until almost 1:00am, and it was moving very slowly across the sky.  From 11:30pm-1:00am, it moved about 5-6 inches in the sky. I spent about an hour on the internet trying to find what this could be - satellites, weather balloon, - but I couldn't find anything.  However, I noticed that the lights were in a similar formation to the Pleiades star cluster.  But I did research on that and I didn't find anything that mentioned the Pleiades star cluster moving. I left around 1:00am, so it could have been there much longer.  I'm going to go out tonight and see if it's there again.

records.summary: Wispy white presence that jetted off after it perceived me to be watching.
records.story: Wispy white presence that jetted off after it perceived me to be watching. Hi, I do not know what I saw last night, but it made the hair on the back of my neck stand up.  It was something unnatural, not of this world. I went out with my dog on a leash to wait for my boyfriend in  his driveway, which is relatively long.   We live in an area of rattlesnakes, so I did not want to venture into the area of the driveway that was not illuminated by the yard lights.   At the end of the driveway, I saw I could only make out was a person wearing a white shirt, yet this “person” lacked 3d perspective.  It was sort of a flat presence, sort of like a big plastic bag being flung into the air and blowing in the wind, yet it was not moving, it was still. I still could not figure out what this was.  Happened very quickly – maybe a one-minute time span.  My dog also alerted, and he was also aware there was something at the end of the driveway.  Well, whatever it was appeared to sort of bend over and though I could see now eyes or anything, I got the distinct impression that it was at that time this object became aware of me.  There was no mistaken that it had “seen” me, perceived me, it knew of my presence.   Again, not through any senses that such as we have here on earth. I am getting chills just retelling it, it was so eerie.  I was moving a bit closer and sort of trying to adjust my eyes to focus, when all of a sudden, it jetted off.  I use the term “jetted” because that is what it did.  From a standstill position to what seemed the speed of a car racing by at 100 mph.  It was gone, across the street and into the brush. When my boyfriend got home, I explained to him what I had seen. Well, he offered explanations, but none was satisfactory as I experienced it and I felt in my core it was something unnatural.  Well, unnatural to this earth.  Since last night, I have been second-guessing myself, but the point remains, I saw what I saw.  It is the nature of whatever beast this is to make you thing you were being delusional, imagining things, etc. At any rate, do you have any insight into what this could have been and perhaps tell me if other people have had similar experiences?   Thanks

records.summary: Reddish/orangish lights blinking turning off and reappearing at a modest altitude for an hour.
records.story: Reddish organish lights blinking turning off and reappearing at a modest altitude for an hour. at about 6 o'clock at work some co workers told me about lights in the sky. intrigued i saw flashing reddish organish lights that were hovering above the ground at an estimated altitude of 3000 feet. they did not move but blinked continuously at a rapid pace, then dim and reappear in a different location. there would be new ones appearing and dimming at different altitudes and close to each other and some spaced. counted 6 at one point.  there were two aircraft nearing the location but still far off and when they got closer at the end they simply turned off one by one til there was nothing. I grew up in as a child of the air force as my father was active duty.   i myself spent 4 yrs in the air force.  I've never seen anything like this. i thought maybe helicopters but no indicator lights flashing green red white. i thought hot air balloons. not sure what it was got some bad pictures on my iPhone... just baffling.

records.summary: Irregular hexagon with 3 big bright lights emitting beams
records.story: Irregular hexagon with 3 big bright lights emitting beams I was outside my home smoking a cigarette at approximately 11:38 three very big bright white lights appeared out of the northern sky moving south east not more then 3 miles from where I was standing.  It came out of no where, flying at no more then an altitude of about 3000 feet.  Each light had about 15 foot beams trailing from each one it appeared to be some mechanism of propulsion; every time the it turned they leaned the opposite direction of the turn.  It made an air blowing like noise it came within 1/4 mile of me and my house.  I got a very good look at it once the beams were facing westward when it turned.  The object was flat it was sort of pentagon in shape but not equal lengths, the front where the lights were; was a very wide broad point the sides towards the back were at a much narrower angle and much shorte, then a straight line connecting those for the very back.   The object was black except for on the back it was grey- silver like a vent type thing on that straight line back, it moved quite slow actually but in no way resembled a stealth bomber other then the nose of it and its flatness but had no defined wings and a very funky back end.   After passing by my house it proceeded west for about another mile before completely vanishing into thin air.  I searched the sky and could see no other aircraft of any kind in the sky. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Three bright, large, orange orbs over Scottsdale.
records.story: Three bright, large, orange orbs over Scottsdale I was walking down my driveway looking to the south east (I was north of the lights), and I witnessed three orange lights in the sky.   They were larger and brighter than aircraft lights.  They were quite a distance away, yet they were as large as the light on a helicopter that flew over my head at around the same time (the helicopter had nothing to do with the sighting, its just a size comparison).  The lights were a minimum of 10 miles away, so they were large and bright enough to clearly see.  They were mostly stationary and they formed a non-equilateral triangle.   The right-most light then started to head to the right (west) and it went out after about 10 seconds.  The middle light did the same thing about 30 seconds later.  The third light remained stationary in the sky for about 2 minutes, and then it faded out, but as it did, another bright orange light appeared to the left of it.  The fourth and final light remained stationary in the sky for another f! ew minutes, and then it faded out. I have an iPhone 5 video of the event that I'd like to upload, but it may take me a few days.

records.summary: Three bright orange low object under the monsoon clouds witnessed by two people.
records.story: Three bright orange low object under the monsoon clouds witnessed by two people My friend and I observed 2 bright orange objects flying towards us very low in the sky as it was monsoon season and we had been having rain.  The two orange objects flew silently at a diagonal toward us under the clouds, so they were pretty low, like low flying aircraft would be.  No sound.   I got my binoculars and we both saw the same things:  Cylinder shape objects with bright orange fire burning inside, then another bright orange light of same color up to the right in the cylinder, but round shape. The 2 objects flew to a point over us.  They hesitated for a few moments, than one flew straight behind us out of sight while the second one flew away at approximately a 45 degree angle to our right.  Again, they were completely silent. We both looked at each other in amazement wondering aloud and comparing our sighting with each other.   While comparing out sighting I looked up at the direction the two objects had come from and there was a third identical object.  This one was much lower and couldn’t have been more than 500 feet over us.  It flew directly towards us and then hovered directly overhead.  A few moments later it also flew off silently at a 45 angle to our right.  We were both to slow in thinking to record this event. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD)) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the incident is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Orange glowing light over Scottsdale, AZ.
records.story: Orange glowing light over Scottsdale, AZ. From my backyard, I noticed what looked like an orange ball of fire moving east to west.  As it got closer, the object appeared to be a flaming chevron or bow shape that was glowing and smoldering like a fire.  The object appeared to completely stop when it was directly south of my backyard, then change direction, moving north toward my home, then stopped again, turning 180 degrees in a half circle motion back to the southern horizon until my view was obstructed by a home.  The object did not make any engine or propeller noise while I observed it and also seemed to change direction in a controlled and deliberate manner.  Visibility was clear and moon, stars and constellations could be clearly seen.

records.summary: 2 Red Orbs hovering over Scottsdale.
records.story: 2 Red Orbs hovering over Scottsdale 2 orange orbs hovering over South Scottsdale as seen from North Scottsdale.  Would blink off and then back on.  Not moving .... Just hovering.  When observed through a spotting scope they appeared as reddish orange light.

records.summary: Looked like a silver of a moon, or circular in shape. Very low and gliding.
records.story: Looked like a sliver of a moon, or circular in shape. Very low and gliding One object, flying East, to Southeast.  Looked like a sliver of a moon, or circular in shape.  Glided along at slow speed and was very low.

records.summary: Bright blue and red lights shifting position as object reoriented before changing direction; hovered, rose, dropped 100' to 1000'; move
records.story: Bright blue and red lights shifting position as object re-oriented before changing direction; hovered, rose, dropped 100' to 1000'; moved suddenly in all directions; no sounds of rotors or other propulsion; went back and forth over approx 1/2 mile around 90th & Via Linda.

records.summary: 1 object seen from car. Bright fire orange in color..When first seen it seemed to be lower towards the ground maybe 100 ft.
records.story: 1 object seen from car. Bright fire orange in color..  When first seen it seemed to be lower towards the ground mabey 100 ft.  I pulled over to watch and record with my phone and it slowly moved higher and began to move north/west.  Not in a straight direction either.  Moved off in the distance and continued to seemingly burn bright orange.  Simply faded. Not because of distance away but the light slowly dimmed and disappeared.  Just gone.  It was substantial in size when first observed. Crazy..

records.summary: Large bright lights are hovering in sw sky. they fade out and reappear iu diffrent part of sky. you can see aircraft lights flying.
records.story: Large bright lights are hovering in sw sky.  They fade out and reappear in diffrent part of sky.  You can see aircraft lights flying m abo See video..  Had tripod set up.  Was third night in a row these lights appeared.

records.summary: Bright orange marble sized fireball/orb.
records.story: Bright orange marble sized fireball/orb At precisely 7:34 pm, I left my home, and began to walk to a nearby convenient store.  The second I turned, and began to walk down the street, (was walking east), I saw a large fire orange colored object, it basically looked like a giant fireball, or a miniature sun, but was slightly off from a perfect sphere.   I knew immediately it wasn't a plane, a star, or a planet, because of its size and distinct orange hue.  It was about the size of a marble.  I couldn't tell exactly how far away it was, but it appeared to be inside the atmosphere at least, not in space.  It was moving very very slowly, straight down.   I did manage to capture about a minute and a half of it, but on my cellphone the quality isn't great.   I thought it might had been a missile of some sort at the time so I was kind of panicked, and since it was moving down, my camera is shaky for some of the footage because I am walking, so I don't lose sight of it.   The sky wasn't even fully dark at the time so you can tell even in this bad footage that this object shouldn't be there, its just too bright, even on my cellphone camera.   At the end of the footage you can see it begin to blink, it did this several times before shrinking into a much much smaller, yellow sphere.   It still followed its path straight down, until it passed the tree and building line, and I lost sight of it. I wish I had better footage, or more information, but...   That's all I've got.  Oh I also forgot to add the object was dead silent.  Shortly after the event, I saw multiple unmarked planes fly in that direction, not all together, but one at a time, about every 30 seconds to a minute apart.

records.summary: Orange fireball-glow, North Scottsdale night sky moving in various directions.Bright ball, radiatiing fingers of light, dimmed to dark
records.story: Orange fireball-glow, North Scottsdale night sky moving in various directions.  Bright ball, radiatiing fingers of light, dimmed to dark Deep, orange fireball-like glow in sky over North Scottsdale wasn’t a plane and didn’t follow a natural arc or line but rather hovered, then moved south to north, then circled back around and as I pulled over the car and tried to focus and discern what it was it then dimmed substantially, seemingly moved quickly to the north, then circled around and down very quickly as if coming down about 50 feet from me, then up behind my car in a small, dark form.   Scared me so I rolled up my windows, closed my sunroof and drove off.   I sensed something coming down out of the sky and moving toward me.   Very unnerving.- educator, mother, business-owner, alone in car

records.summary: Bluish/purple light moving horizontally and vertically over East Scottsdale.
records.story: Bluish/purple light moving horizontally and vertically over East Scottsdale. From Scottsdale (Shea and 101 area) facing east-a bluish / light purple light was hovering in the sky about 3 miles out - the light did not flicker, did not blink, did not get brighter or dimmer. The light was moving in a right to left and left to right direction, occasionally moving up and down.  This movement CANNOT be created by an airplane, helicopter, a balloon or even a flare burning out.  This was moving at a casual pace which never really moved more than 5 degrees from my plane of sight. It took about 45 seconds to finally fall behind a tree and then came out of the left side of the tree and started heading down again.  There was a plane heading towards it and you can see the planes lights flashing while the other light did not change. It fell behind the treeline and disappeared.

records.summary: Crazy bright blue light.
records.story: Crazy bright blue light. Bright blue dot flying overhead at shea and 96th st.   Then stopped suddenly and  changed directions and flew erratically overhead before flying away... pretty fun to watch

records.summary: Large orange glowing ball falls to earth.
records.story: Large orange glowing ball falls to earth. Large orange glowing ball fell to land.  Three witnesses, none of us have seen anything like this before.

records.summary: FAST MOVING MIRRORED GLASS LIKE ORB RIGHT UNDER THE SUN
records.story: FAST MOVING MIRRORED GLASS LIKE ORB RIGHT UNDER THE SUN. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: UFOs over Scottsdale, Arizona.
records.story: UFOs over Scottsdale, Arizona. Every night and early morning there have been ufos ranging from 2-20 over the past four months.  Two neighbors joked saying I was looking at stars until they looked through the binoculars I was using.  A distinct saucer shape with "knobs" both on top and bottom can clearly be seen with red, blue and green rotating lights. Also noticable were little white lights darting around the object.

records.summary: Lights in formation seen over freeway.
records.story: Lights in formation seen over freeway. I saw 4-5 lights in a straight line hovering over the 101 freeway in Scottsdale.  At first I thought it was helicopters, but then I realized there were no flashing lights.  Then one by one they went straight up into the sky and disappeared.

records.summary: Two Orange Balls of Light Over Scottsdale, AZ.
records.story: Two Orange Balls of Light Over Scottsdale, AZ My son and his two friends called me excitedly to come look.  We saw two big orange orbs - almost looked like Chinese lanterns, lit up - moving in a Southeasterly direction at a fairly rapid clip -  I went to get my camera and husband, which took me about 15 seconds and by the time I got back, they were almost out of sight, probably over East Mesa.   They were moving side by side and, to me, looked too close together to be aircraft - besides, they were close enough to clearly distinguish that they were round in shape.   Have never seen anything like it!

records.summary: Seen in Scottsdale Arizona, 3 Bright Yellow Lights in Triangle Formation Hover Low to Ground then fly off together
records.story: Seen in Scottsdale Arizona, 3 Bright Yellow Lights in Triangle Formation Hover Low to Ground then fly off together I observed 3 big bright round lights flying overhead completely silently, hovering in place very low to the ground in a triangle formation from each other.  They hovered for 1-2 minutes then flew up and East while staying in their triangle formation.  That was definitely not an airplane, or helicopter or anything I can identify.

records.summary: Its shape was outlined from the two lights on the ends and how it covered the stars behind it.
records.story: Its shape was outlined from the two lights on the ends and how it covered the stars behind it. Me and my two young sons were leaving on a bike to home.  I was fixing the bike seat so my older of the two sons could ride the younger one home, as I was going to walk besides them.   I looked up and saw two lights floating by, seems close to the ground.  I walked over couple of feet and saw it was a triangle, black, quiet, floating straight north.  I told my boys to look and they started yelling and saying "what is that?"  I began yelling to, hoping someone would come out to see it.   The lights were small and white on the ends of the side that was facing us.  I told my youngest to run inside the house to get my nephew to see it.  He tried to run, but fell.  By the time my nephew came out, it went draught into the clouds.   I was excited, but my son's began to shake terriblely.  And one even threw up from being so scared of what we had just seen. It took about 3-4 minutes for it to be a field away from us to get into the clouds about 8 miles away. It was low, no noise. I'm in shock.

records.summary: Not the Phoenix Lights, but the Scottsdale Lights.
records.story: Not the Phoenix Lights, but the Scottsdale Lights. My journey started near Greenway road and 56th street at around 8pm.  It was dark outside on March 13, 1997.  I needed to head out to CompUSA which was located near Scottsdale Road and Shea Blvd.  I was heading north on 56th street and I made a left on Shea Blvd which had me heading east towards Scottsdale road.  As I was driving east on Shea, when I got to about 60th Place, I noticed a couple lights coming around on the east side of the McDowell mountains on my left.  They were higher the peak of the mountain which is 3,900 feet, my estimate would be somewhere between 5,000 and 8,000 feet. As I drove to about 64th street, I noticed about 4 lights spaced at what I would estimate about a 1 or 2 blocks apart.  My immediate thoughts were these are some military helicopters because the speed they were travel was way to slow compared to airplanes.  Scottsdale Airpark is right in the same area and I’ve seen hundreds of planes coming in and out of that airport and none ever flown in that formation.  And I would not say commercial airplanes because none have every flown in that direction either. I kept looking out to the left out my window and counted about 7 lights now.  All evenly spaces and was in kind of an arch, like the arch of an old fashion bow.  Totally strange to me because I have never seen any lights like this before, so I was excited to think it was a convoy of military helicopters. When I made it to my destination and got out of my car, I looked up and watched the lights come and pass right over me.  2 of the 7 lights went right over my head.  When they went over, I heard ZERO sounds.  Just a light that sputtered and it was completely black around the lights.   I watched as the 3 light went over and in my head, I said this is really strange because I hear NOTHING.  The lights traveled very slowly.  I waited more than 5 minutes in the parking lot for the first light to travel over and then probably 3 to 5 minutes for the second light. I headed into the store and did my shopping.  Never once did I think of it as a UFO.  I used to watch XFiles at that time and didn’t think of taking a picture.  I was thinking they were silent helicopters that ran about a mile or more in length.   After about 20 to 30 minutes in the store, I came out and the lights were gone. It wasn’t for a day or two later when I heard the news and it made me think different about what I saw.  The strange part, these lights were in northeast Scottsdale.  Not southwest Phoenix like the Phoenix lights were reported and known for. This event, these lights are burned into my memory like it was yesterday.

records.summary: Bluish Green diamond shaped coming in at a steep angle towards the earth, then it banked hard right and gained altitude as it headed S.
records.story: Bluish Green diamond shaped coming in at a steep angle towards the earth, then it banked hard right and gained altitude as it headed S. Just dropped my Girlfriend off after seeing movie.  Was entering on the 101 Freeway heading south from Shea Rd Exit. At first I though it was a shooting star.  It had a blue/greenish color to it.  It looked like it was going to crash into the indian reservation (Talking Stick Casino) but before it hit, it changed directions and shot across the 101 Freeway toward Phoenix at an AMAZING SPEED and just disappeared as it gained altitude.   Other people on the Freeway saw this too.

records.summary: Around 7:15 PM, 4 others and I witnessed 2-3 glowing orbs over Mesa/Salt River Reservation in AZ.
records.story: Video taken by a witness:  http://youtu.be/iQ2ht9sxNfk   Around 7:15 PM, 4 others and I witnessed 2-3 glowing orbs over Mesa/Salt River Reservation in Arizona.  As I watched in awe, it looked like energy was charging up and the orb was flashing various colors, then my camera got blurry and the focus stopped working. It almost seemed as if it were some sort of energy like pulse.   The orbs aligned into triangular formations as well as a line.  Previously to starting video there was 4 orbs that moved fast across the sky in a way that I could only say compares  to a star realigning In the sky.  At the end the orbs grew closer and combined into one orb that ended up fading out and slowly grew harder to see.   I don't know what this was, but I have never seen ANYTHING like it before.   In person the light coming off of it was powerful.

records.summary: I saw 10 objects in the eastern sky with white and red blinking lights and they are not airplanes. They move back and forth.
records.story: i saw 10 objects in the eastern sky with white and red blinking lights and they are not airplanes.  They move back and forth. very creepy.

records.summary: I looked up at a very bright shining circle objects.  ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of planets?  PD))
records.story: I was working graveyard shift at Tatum and Deer Valley I was on my lunch break at 3 a.m. and off of our three story balcony when I was smoking a cigarette I looked up at a very bright shining circle objects at first I thought it might be a star or a planet from far away I realized after recording the video on my phone that it's definitely not when I worked the next day at the same location there is no I like to be found it was pulsating also I have been trying to upload the video for social media but its too large. ((NUFORC Note:  Possible sighting of planets, we suspect?  PD))

records.summary: Two shiny orbs east Scottsdale, AZ.
records.story: Two shiny orbs east Scottsdale, AZ. I'm at work and I see 2 bright shiny orbs over Scottsdale and they slowly headed east over the mountains.  Before they started moving, they stayed close to central and Bethany for a short period, and then took off towards Scottsdale. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I saw a what appeared to be a  very bright star but was too big  and too round low in eastern sky.had circles inside circles under zoom
records.story: I saw a what appeared to be a  very bright star but was too big  and too round low in eastern sky.had circles inside circles under zoom At about  4:30 am I witnessed what seemed to be a really bright star looking toward the eastern sky just a little ways above the Mcdowell  mtns.  It was way too bright and too perfectly  round to be a star, so I  got my digital camera with a 36x digital zoom lens and when I zoomed I was completely startled.  It took a little time for me to remember how to use the zoom and get the camera to work correctly as I was seeing on the camera screen what resembled a sort of bright perfectly round object with concentric circles getting smaller as you go towards the center and a solid dot in the middle of this object.  Which by the  way was still shining bright into the morning light while all other stars had disappeared from sight.  There also appeared to be a smaller object that appeared to be spinning with light emitting from it as it  stood out because it was kind of black and it was in different positions  inside the outside edge and in some shots it didn’t appear at all.  I shot  pics for over an hour until my battery ran out and it was day light.  I went inside for another battery and it was gone when I came out.

records.summary: Unusually shaped object flying over North Scottsdale.
records.story: Unusually shaped object flying over North Scottsdale. North Scottsdale, Arizona.  My wife and I had been observing the night sky and noticed something strange.  The object was flying from South to North.  We observed the object for about 20 seconds as we watched from the central courtyard of our house; the house prevented us from viewing any longer. I’ve seen the international space station fly over before and this was most definitely not the same viewing experience. This object seemed to be in the normal flight path, however, no visible navigation lights and the object was dimly lit, almost bluish.  It was cauliflower shaped and seemed to be tumbling end over end. Approximate altitude was 10-12,000 feet. My wife and I have over 60 years of combined (military and civilian) aviation experience and have not seen anything like this before.

records.summary: 4 lights seen in a formation.
records.story: 4 lights seen in a formation. The object was in a triangle light formation with an additional light on the side.  The formation did not move for the duration I observed.  There were four bright circular lights, and they were relatively close together.  I first noticed the lights after exiting the 101 and going down Frank Lloyd Wright.  My mom pulled over into a residential area to take pictures.  I've been watching the skies, and keeping track of anything out of the ordinary.  Last year on March 4, 2015, a single light was hovering in the same spot for 45 minutes.  I am unsure about the correlation between this incident and the previous one from last year, but I couldn't disregard the possible connection due to the fact that it was around the same date and time.

records.summary: 5 lights seen traveling over Scottsdale/North Mesa area in uniform fashion.
records.story: 5 lights seen traveling over Scottsdale/ North Mesa area in uniform fashion. I was driving south on 101 Scottsdale toward Chandler.  Just before the Raintree exit, 5 light all in a row, travel from west of Scottsdale towards the east over the freeway (toward Fountain Hills).  They are evenly spaced without blinking lights, just white/pale yellow in color.   The lights move in a unified direction headed south very slowly, over Talking Stick resort area.  At moments they are still as if they are "hovering" in the sky.  I could see a helicopter around the lights and could tell the difference.  The helicopter had blinking red and blue lights were as the other lights did not.   The lights move south toward North Mesa, where I called a friend and he was at Gilbert Road and University.  He stated he could see lights hovering above him, but since he was looking up, he only saw 3 not 5.  He also stated that there wasn't any blinking lights like a helicopter. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Bright white lights and lots of helicopters.
records.story: Bright white lights and lots of helicopters Two very white bright lights were hovering over the city and/or native reservation.  There were so many helicopters out, I would say probably seven roaming around.  I described another similar incident that happened on January 6, 2016, that is more detailed.

records.summary: Star-like object in SE sky over Reservation with distinct multi-colored lights.  ((NUFORC Note:  Sighting of the star, Sirius.  PD))
records.story: Star-like object in southeast sky over Reservation with distinct multi-colored lights. ((NUFORC Note:  Sighting of the star, Sirius.  PD))   Both yesterday (12/31/15) and tonight (1/1/16) we have seen a star-like object in the southeast sky as we went on a walk.  It caught my attention because it looks larger that a normal star and was twinkling different colors - blue, green, white, and red.  It behaved like the star as it moved higher in the sky as the night went on. I lost interest as I thought it must have been just a star.   Tonight I went for a walk with my parents and saw it again.  I pointed it out and they thought it was very strange. My whole family lived hear O'Hare in Chicago for a majority of our lives making us used to aircraft. We got out the binoculars and four of us (me, my parents, my boyfriend) viewed it through the binoculars all seeing the same thing - distinct red, blue, green, white lights - my dad said it reminded him of LEDs because they were so vivid and distinct. I could also see the halo around the object changing color with the object. My parents said they've never seen an! ything like it. It was higher than the planes that had taken off from the PHX airport (south, southwest of where we are, which flew below within the same view).  This is near 101 off Indian Bend Road. I am visiting my parents from Chicago. They said it is over the Native Amer Reservation east of Scottdale. I would like to know if this could be disproven, but everything man-made that flies doesn't really fit. Also, it doesn't fit as a star considering the distinct lighting. I also have video, but it's so grainy and it only looks like a star. Please let me know if anyone has an idea or if you would like video.

records.summary: Three bright lights in a triangle formation low on the horizon; disappearing and reappearing as well as traveling.
records.story: Three bright lights in a triangle formation low on the horizon; disappearing and reappearing as well as traveling. ((male name deleted)) and 110th st.  Scottsdale, AZ, higher than the rest of the valley 7:30-8:30pm  I stepped outside to see three large bright lights in the sky in a triangle formation.  I was driving but every time I looked they had rotated while staying in a triangle.  If you had a full moon and put a point on the top and sides of a full moon, I would say this is how far they were from one another.  By the time I pulled over there was only one light left; I told my boyfriend I wasn’t going anywhere until this light disappeared.  It was not above me in the sky, but south of me low on the horizon. Another bright light reappeared nearby the other.  One left its location and slowly crossed the sky.  It decreased in brightness and traveled east to west.  If you split the sky in 18 sections, it would cross one of these in a little less than a minute.  Planes flew by but were fast and not nearly as bright as even the traveling UFO.  The light they emitted was pure white.  When they traveled they usually got dimmer.  I took off my glasses and the only light I could see in the sky, including stars, were these lights. We starred at them freaking out with excitement for an hour.  They would occasionally disappear and reappear in a nearby location.  My boyfriend and I argued of what he thought was a plane at about 8 o’clock.  It had two very dim white lights flashing very close in proximity and moved faster than the UFO’s before.  I convinced him that it was a UFO because the lights were not consistent in spacing.  They also would fly back and forth from east to west. Also I do not know if it was just me because I was wearing glasses, but they individually appeared to be elongated vertically.  The light looked like it came to a small point and expanded to the rest of the light. It was very subtle, but he said he could kind of see it too. We ended up leaving before they were gone.  At midnight I was back on the road and I could see one bright UFO.  A couple minutes passed and it was gone; I didn’t see anything else this night.

records.summary: Very fast, noiseless bright lit lights.
records.story: Very fast, noiseless bright lit lights. Watching the clear evening sky, into my vision came a very fast, noiseless moving object.  There was a red light and a white light.  I was sure it was a jet, but too low to not have a noise associated with it.   Moving from east to west, as it moved from my vision, only bright white light was still showing. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous.  Possible hoax??  PD))

records.summary: A shadow moving across mountain peaks which cause could not be determined.
records.story: A shadow moving across mountain peaks which cause could not be determined. At about 11:43 on Sunday, May 29, 2016, I observed the following.  There were no clouds from horizon to horizon in any given direction.  The temperature was in the low nineties.  I was in a patrol vehicle at my place of employment traveling in a northern direction and drifting slightly east.  To the north west of my locating about a half a mile away there are some small peaks that are maybe a thousand feet higher in elevation than my location.   These peaks are strung out east to west. I glance at the peaks and saw a round dark shadow that followed the surface contour of the landscape moping from east to west.  I only saw it for a couple of seconds before it passed the most western peak. What was strange about it was that the sun at that time in the morning is almost straight up and the peaks are very close to my location.  I immediately stopped (less than five seconds) and got out of the vehicle looking for an object that may have caused the round shadow, but there was nothing to be seen anywhere in the sky in my general location. There was nothing between the sun and those peaks.  There was nothing moving out of the area heading west as far as the eye could see.  Many miles to the west (about twenty miles) I could see Sky Harbor International traffic along the I-17 corridor flying from north to south, but those shadows would be cast further to the west.  I had seen shadows before across those peaks caused by aircraft but they moved slower and had the definite shape of an aircraft.  This was round and moving very fast.  I estimate the size of the shadow to have been about sixty to eighty feet in diameter. End of Report

records.summary: Flash of light in the sky followed by a boom, followed by smoke trails that appear in uneven circles. ((NUFORC Note:  Meteor?  PD))
records.story: Flash of light in the sky followed by a boom, followed by smoke trails that appear in uneven circles. At 3:56am a very bright flash of light was seen in the eastern sky over scottsdale.  Around 5 minutes later a loud bang was heard as if someone was slamming the door inside a house.  I witnessed this inside and the other witness was outside for the noise.  As the sun came up around 4:50am colorful trails that were in uneven circles were seen in the sky.   After checking several outdoor security cameras the light was seen.  Pictures have been taken of the flash and the colorful trails in the sky. ((NUFORC Note:  Object reported by the news as a probable meteor.  We agree.  See photos of smoky trail left high in the sky above Arizona.  PD))

records.summary: Upon stepping out to the back yard this evening, I noticed 3 large, orange fireball type objects low in the north sky.
records.story: Upon stepping out to the back yard this evening, I noticed 3 large, orange fireball type objects low in the north sky.  These objects were stacked in a vertical fashion in no measured formation with a vector towards the vertical.  These objects appeared to move rather slowly.  The size of each object to be roughly a third the size of a full moon.  No sound included in this sighting.  These objects moved to the vertical to about 60 degrees vertical before the light appeared to suddenly dim, then continued to vertical over head.  A large very dim/muted object three times the size of each individual "fireball" appeared to travel west, southwest orbitally.

records.summary: Huge fire orange objects over Phoenix.
records.story: Huge fire orange objects over Phoenix. Leaving our house in the mountains of Scottsdale with a view of the city, my wife said oh my god what is that?  There were three huge diamond shaped lights in the sky that were fire orange.  They had two smaller white lights flanking the side.   They suddenly changed formation and disappeared.    They were 10x the size of commercial jets landing at Sky Harbor which we have a view of.   Oddly enough, my office is by the Scottsdale Airport and there were many (f18’s – not exactly sure) on the tarmac all week, which is odd because there are very few military planes there ever (I have worked close to that airport for over 20 years and have only seen military aircraft for air-shows.) ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Dark & Light Circular Objects Raced Across the Sky.
records.story: Dark & Light Circular Objects Raced Across the Sky Looking in the west direction, black object moved across the sky from south to north moving very fast (arms length cover 5 sec) time.  Object was much higher then commercial airline due to seeing commercial airline moving north to west direction.   Object stopped on a dime then shot straight up no longer in view.  The black disk shaped object had no markings, no lights, no noise and very big.  The size of this object was about 5-6 Boeing 747 in diameter at 80 degrees from my position of view.   Seconds later another large object (white) at the same altitude as the black object moved north to where the black object shot straight up and lost view. The white object was saucer in shape much lighter in color then the first object, also at 80 degrees of view. The white object was moving very fast, (half of arms length covered 2.5 seconds +-)  The white object had no markings, no light, no noise).  Location view Mayo Clinic Shea Blvd facing west, it was truely amazing thing to see, my only regret was that I didn't have time to record or take pictures with cellphone.

records.summary: Bright white light.
records.story: bright white light Like many nights, I'm watching the sky.  I noticed something out of the corner of my eye, and when I turned to look, I saw a very bright light and it went out.  It came on again within 2 seconds.  I didn't think much of it since it was in a high flight path for airlines.   In between the light flashes, the object didn't move much more the a passenger plane would have moved, it flashed one more time and I never saw any lights again, it just disappeared.   I noticed there were no other navigation lights.  No red or green nor a flashing white. this flight path was west to east and would have to be 10 to 30 thousand feet.  No contrail was observed.  No sound heard. I would describe the light as very bright like a helicopter landing light.  The light was to my south and between 75 to 80 degrees, almost overhead. Within about 1 minute there was a plane making an east to west pass almost on a reciprocal course and altitude, all lights were visible, you could hear it, there was no comparison between the two. I spent 2 years active duty in the navy.  I was trained in lookout techniques, and was a radar operator in the combat information center for most of my service.

records.summary: Me and my mother were looking outside at the night sky. After a few moments we saw a plane off in the distance. Then at least 20 minute
records.story: Me and my mother were looking outside at the night sky.  After a few moments we saw a plane off in the distance.  Then at least 20 minutes went by then, they were two headlight looking objects flying at least 50 ft off the ground.   Once we were clearly in sight of the object, the lights went out.  There were a lot of stars out so once the headlights went out we could see the outline of it.   The shape of it was a triangle you with curves.

records.summary: Hovering and then fast moving object, Scottsdale, AZ.
records.story: Hovering and then fast moving object, Scottsdale, AZ. Hovering bright red light in southwest sky then extremely fast moving south to north.  Moving in a very straight, smooth line north.  Oval shape with tail that had a green light.   This happened south of Camelback and Hayden Roads and moved very fast north.  Color may have been light blue or gray.

records.summary: Bright light in sky, slowly increase elevation and then faded. Second night in a row.
records.story: Bright light in sky, slowly increase elevation and then faded. Second night in a row. I am a semi-retired finance professional with an advanced degree.  I rarely drink and do not do any drugs.  I am also an amateur astronomer with a small scope, and because the airport is fairly close, a plane watcher with binocs on the outside table at all times.  The point is that I am intelligent, sober, rational, skeptical, and I can recognize planes, man-made satellites (have seen 3), and stars/planets.  What I saw was not one of these. On 4/12, at 10:30 PM, took dogs outside for the normal business.  As usual I looked at the stars.  Visibility was good – a bit hazy at about 20 degrees and below from a dust storm earlier in the day but generally clear directly overhead with major constellations visible.   Saw a bright flash (about as bright as landing lights turning on but much farther away and not in the flight pattern) due west at about a 70 degree elevation.  The light was flashing at 15 second intervals (I measured it) which is too infrequent even for a plane at cruising altitude.  It was moving south for about 3 minutes but moving too slow for an aircraft and much much too slow for a satellite.  It also did not seem to be moving in a straight line (somewhat difficult to tell due to infrequency of flashes).  Over this time the light gradually dimmed and took-on a slight reddish hue before it became too dim to see. On 4/13 at 8:30 PM went outside for some fresh air.  Looked up and saw the identical scene with these changes:  I did not see initial flash and the direction was south/southeast.  The sky was much clearer tonight. Also, about 8 weeks ago I was up very early 3:00AM to catch a flight.  Outside with the dogs.  Looked up and saw a moving, steady light (no flashing or colored lights) about the size and magnitude of a typical star.  It was moving slower than satellites I have seen before, and seemed much too high for an aircraft (my first thought was that it was a private jet a high altitude).  The light moved straight south covering about a 20 degree arc and then quickly faded at about Orion’s shoulders. The third sighting in the list very well could have been a satellite, but the other two were definitely neither planes, satellites, nor meteorites.

records.summary: Object sighted, triangular shaped with curved magenta bottom.  Lights moved sequentially from left to right bluish-white with magenta .
records.story: Object sighted, triangular shaped with curved magenta bottom.  Lights moved sequentially from left to right bluish-white with magenta . Scottsdale, AZ 85260 - Near Shea Boulevard and 101 Loop (Highway).                    Approximately 8:30 pm Saturday, April 14th, 2018. At approximately 8:30 pm Saturday, April 14th, 2018 I arrived at my home, parked my car and stepped to the backyard. I am in a neighborhood that is dark, does not have streetlights and the properties are all close to 1 acre plus in size, the night is clear, still has some suspended dust particles in the lower atmosphere/sky that can affect the color like a filter. I unplugged the lights that illuminate a Paolo Verde tree in my backyard.  I looked to the South West and saw the “Belt of Orion” the significantly identifiable constellation that I recall my children always pointing out to me.  I was alone and enjoying the dark sky and the stars straight up and to the north. After seeing the “North Star” as directed by the “Big Dipper’s” outer ladle stars I turned back to view towards the South East and saw a magenta colored object with sequential lights, like a 1970 Ford Thunderbird with its right turn signal on, observed rolling from my left to right moving at a steady swift speed in a Southern and lower trajectory; maybe below 10,000 to 15,000 feet. The object seemed to stay on the same altitude in my field of vision. The lights were red and then bright white and the background of the lights lit up in magenta (magenta, somewhere midway between blue and red); it was very pretty and very different.  The lights where arranged in similarity to a shallow bowl, curving upwards and at an apex point above there was a point that was not lit but visible with some opaque connection from the curved lit zone upward to that apex point. The sequential movement of the light created a visual image that made the object seem to be spinning, however it was very quick and this was unlike anything I have seen in the sky before. I witnessed the sighting for about 5 to 10 seconds, then ran into my house and gathered my binoculars which were very close to the screen door to view.  I was excited to view the same outline however, the sequential movement of the lights changed to an “all on” or all illuminated pattern but, the apex point (at the top of the curved bowl shape) and the outline of a structure was more evident. I quickly went back into my house to grab my camera that can zoom and potentially capture an image.  At first because the screen is very small and aligning the camera in the night with a moving object in the sky I didn’t think I captured the image. However, I do have something on the camera. It is very small and only visible for about less than 1.5 seconds.  The camera shows a more blue in color but, I do not have a good way to review the video yet.  On the counter between 6 and 8 seconds, the small spot in the field of view on the top half of the screen shows, what I believe is the moving object described above.  It is very quick and very poor, the larger light was unfortunately one of my solar powered lawn lights.  I am willing to share the video, the sighting in the video is on the higher side of the field of view than the garden light I ended up targeting instead for the remainder of the shoot.

records.summary: I was driving hone and when I got off the 101 at Hayden road in north Scottsdale I saw a bunch of smaller crafts hovering in the sky wi
records.story: I was driving home, and when I got off the 101 at Hayden road in north Scottsdale, I saw a bunch of smaller crafts hovering in the sky with flashing lights; I counted 10.   They were moving too quickly to be planes, and I saw one get lower and lower to the ground and then just disappear.

records.summary: Object is visible in sky in burst of flashing light disappearing and appearing intermittently
records.story: Object is visible in sky in burst of flashing light disappearing and appearing intermittently In the video there is a flashing light in the sky that appears and disappears repeatedly.  By eye the objects appears to have an aura or haze around it.  I have seen these frequently by naked eye and cannot seem to identify what it could be.

records.summary: Numerous objects (6+) moving in various directions being pursued by military crafts it appeared, nighttime above Scottsdale, AZ.
records.story: Numerous objects (6+) moving in various directions being pursued by military crafts it appeared, nighttime above Scottsdale, AZ. 1450ft above sea level. Viewed from 33°36’48” N x 111°52’35 W Viewed with a naked eye  Numerous unidentified “aircraft” shaped objects above North Scottsdale, Sunday, August 5th, 2018, at 8:48 p.m. The initial object was a solid bright orange, not flashing, then the orange disappeared and was replaced by what appeared to be all dark with a spotlight being adjusted.  This object was moving NE to SW, then changed direction and moved W, it flew at increased and decreased pitch like a greater-than-less-than symbol. Several airplanes appeared shortly after and began flying towards the object, at which point three additional objects that appeared to look like Military Drones, as they were torpedo-shaped but with large bat or seagull shaped wings.  As it was dark outside, I determined shape by looking at the cast of the light.  Eventually a fourth object that was solely a golden Naples-yellow color appeared where previously I had identified Venus as being with the use of the SkyView Application, as if the lights were just turned on, and then the object began traveling quite slowly North to South. All of the objects with the exception of the identifiable aircraft were silent, and no wind sheer could be heard.  The initial object appeared to be around 15,000 feet high, while the other objects appeared to be above the 38,000ft altitude most commercial aircraft fly at. Then at 9:35pm what initially appeared to be a military aircraft, silently jettisoned across the sky very quickly, North to South, before eventually turning and heading East also seen from Scottsdale.  Though initially it appeared to be a military jet with traditional lighting for perhaps a Stealth plane or an F18 Hornet, then the lights suddenly vanished and a golden light overtook the silhouette of the aircraft and instead of traveling East it made a full loop very quickly as if traveling faster than anything I’d ever seen before, at which point a loud guttural sound was heard, perhaps it was an antique military craft, but all observations do not support that theory.  Throughout the totality of the event a plethora of sounds could be heard from airplane, to jet sounds, to sounds similar to motor boats, as well as sounds similar to Electronic music synthesizers. The initial observer and his fiancée  are a 34 year old man and a 33 year old woman ,residents of Scottsdale, who is originally from Chicago and recently moved to Arizona in 2017, initially moving to Wickenburg before moving to Scottsdale on 1/118.  The man is a graduate of Columbia College Chicago and has a degree in Art History and has a passion for art, fashion, photography, wildlife, poetry, literature, history, Geology, Lapidary, Nature, and Politics.  The woman studied Pre-Med at Northwestern University Chicago and received an additional degree in Creative Non-fiction from Pitzer College, California, she top shares many of the same interests, and they both work in high fashion retail management. The third observer is an Arizona native, 35 years old, with a history of drug abuse and extensive criminal background, the fourth observer is also an Arizona Native who works in Engineering and Refrigeration, lives in Scottsdale and enjoys off-roading.  He is 39 years of age.

records.summary: 2 blue lights in the Sky East of Phoenix July 3, 2018.  ((anonymous report))
records.story: 2 blue lights in the Sky East of Phoenix July 3, 2018 Two Blue lights appearing in the low sky East of phoenix (From Scottsdale they were in the direction of Mesa).  Both lights blinked and moved around each other in a circular pattern.   They remained in that general direction for 1.5 hours.  They appeared to have bursts of light a couple times. They were pointed out to us by a neighbor.  We had company at our house and we all went outside to witness.  We took photos and a video. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides little contact information.  PD))

records.summary: There was a light moving intermittently in the sky with a hazy aura surrounding it.
records.story: There was a light moving intermittently in the sky with a hazy aura surrounding it. We went outside on the patio and noticed a light in the sky, making erratic movements intermittently.  There was some kind of hazy aura around the object.  It appeared to be low in the sky and then disappeared.   We live very close to Scottsdale Airpark and see planes in the flight path daily.  There were other planes flying to and from the airpark when we noticed this object, which was very different from the planes flying last night and during other times we have seen them.   It was very obviously not an airplane but we have no other idea what it could have been. ((NUFORC Note:  We spoke with both witnesses to the event, husband and wife, and we found them both to be quite eloquent and sober-minded.  We suspect that they are highly reliable witnesses.  PD))

records.summary: a red light in the night sky with a slow blinking white light
records.story: a red light in the night sky with a slow blinking white light tonight i was walking around my apartment complex for while considering how nice out it is. on the way to the mailbox area, I saw a red light in the sky, and it had a slowly blinking white light. it was flying either downwards or farther away, I couldnt tell. it couldnt have been a plane since there was no noise of it flying. i tried to capture it with video footage on my windows phone, but i dont think anything showed up. this was about 20 to 30 minutes ago.

records.summary: Solid bright red light (thought it was a small plane) moving SE the speed of small plane from above North Scottsdale. Red glow turned t
records.story: Solid bright red light (thought it was a small plane) moving SE the speed of small plane from above North Scottsdale.  Red glow turned to orange and grew 4X in size as it brightened and slowed down to near stop.  Slowly turned to NE direction changed from orange to white and slowly faded out.  Approximate time laps 2-3 minutes.  Not sure if it was a flare.  No other aircraft close in proximity were visible.

records.summary: 3 lights above McDowell mountains, changing colors rapidly.
records.story: 3 lights above McDowell mountains, changing colors rapidly. Have a really unique view of the McDowell mountains, on Mummy Mountain, up on the mountain, around 1600 ft of elevation. Was looking towards the McDowells, which would be directly Northeast of my view. Looked up and immediately was entranced by 3 very bright and large lights in the sky. Airplanes flying near so I could distinguish between a airplane as plane lights blink but these were not blinking.  My glasses weren’t on so they looked blurry, but they also were colorful and rapidly changing light colors.  I grabbed some binoculars and looked through, the light would change rapidly from yellow, green, red, blue, etc.  The lights were stationary for a couple minutes, maybe 2-3 minutes.  Soon they all started moving slowly to the south together, with the lights forming in a triangular formation.  They would move and rotate with one another, as if the 3 lights were a point of an invisible triangle rotating in the sky. They all faded out and disappeared after 5 minutes or so.  Had my wife look at the lights and she immediately noticed their colors changing as well.

records.summary: 6 Silver Irregular Flying Objects Zig-Zagging Over Scottsdale, AZ
records.story: 6 Silver Irregular Flying Objects Zig-Zagging Over Scottsdale, AZ There were 6 silver objects flying off in the distance in zig zags and other particular patterns that no regular aircraft could do. I was able to get pictures of these 6 flying objects and it shows the shape of them and edge of the craft.  The moon was able to beam off of the flying objects which is why they where easy to spot.  The flying objects looked to be in a specific tear drop or almost circular pattern.
